div.p: I am getting so tired of absence that I will try and leave here by the last of this week if possible, Judge Barnity is absent and if he returns in time I will try and get off I can not leave untill he returns. by the papers I see that the Cholera is in Key West there being 17 cases among the soldiers who are to be removed to Tampa I hear that it is also in NO and Mobile but it is not in the papers. I suppose it will sweep over the land with the wing of the destroying angel and destroy the whole negro race and many whites. but as far as I can learn but few persons of regular habits die even if they are attacked the dissipated and destitute are the more usual victims and the mortality of two years is but slightly increased by the epidemic Love and Kisses to all
